sqlite_queries.cpe_lookup: SELECT DISTINCT vendor, product, version FROM cpe_t
sqlite_queries.create_cpe_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {} (cpe_id TEXT NOT NULL, part TEXT NOT NULL, vendor TEXT NOT NULL, product TEXT NOT NULL, version TEXT NOT NULL, 'update' TEXT NOT NULL, edition TEXT NOT NULL, language TEXT NOT NULL, sw_edition TEXT NOT NULL, target_sw TEXT NOT NULL, target_hw TEXT NOT NULL, other TEXT NOT NULL)
sqlite_queries.create_cve_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {} (cve_id TEXT NOT NULL, year INTEGER NOT NULL, cpe_id TEXT NOT NULL, part TEXT NOT NULL, vendor TEXT NOT NULL, product TEXT NOT NULL, version TEXT NOT NULL, 'update' TEXT NOT NULL, edition TEXT NOT NULL, language TEXT NOT NULL, sw_edition TEXT NOT NULL, target_sw TEXT NOT NULL, target_hw TEXT NOT NULL, other TEXT NOT NULL)
sqlite_queries.create_summary_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {} (cve_id TEXT NOT NULL, year INTEGER NOT NULL, summary TEXT NOT NULL )
sqlite_queries.cve_lookup: SELECT cve_id, vendor, product, version FROM cve_t
sqlite_queries.delete_outdated: DELETE FROM {} WHERE cve_id IN (SELECT cve_id FROM {})
sqlite_queries.exist: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name='{}'
sqlite_queries.extract_relevant: SELECT * FROM {} AS new WHERE new.year IN (SELECT distinct(year) FROM cve_t)
sqlite_queries.insert_cpe: INSERT INTO {} (cpe_id, part, vendor, product, version, 'update', edition, language, sw_edition, target_sw, target_hw, other) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
sqlite_queries.insert_cve: INSERT INTO {} (cve_id, year, cpe_id, part, vendor, product, version, 'update', edition, language, sw_edition, target_sw, target_hw, other) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

test_queries.setup_test_row: INSERT INTO test1(first_name, last_name, age) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
test_queries.setup_test_table: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test1(first_name TEXT, last_name TEXT, age INTEGER)
test_queries.test_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS test2(x INTEGER)
test_queries.test_insert: INSERT INTO test1(first_name, last_name, age) VALUES(?, ?, ?)
test_queries.test_tables: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table'
